channel.title: UNC MBB TRIVIA
channel.description: Recent content on UNC MBB TRIVIA

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Welcome to UNC MBB TRIVIA! Just another casual fan here to talk about UNC Men’s Basketball trivia time to time for all Tar Heels fans to enjoy. Stay tuned!

item.title: Winning Series
item.description: Here it is, the very first trivia! Frankly I was initially curious which schools have kept winning against UNC and found out which, but to start off things on a positive note :) I’m posting which schools have never won against UNC since 1949-50 season while having played UNC at least 10 times. There they are: Citadel, Rutgers, Stanford, and Tulane! Two of these teams are on UNC’s schedule for upcoming 2017-2018 season, so it’ll be interesting to see if UNC can keep the winning streak.
